name: Proto & Friend's Diner (DEMO, BETA)
description:
Proto & Friends Diner is a fan-made FNAF horror game created by Warrior-E_X_E, where you play as a character named Marv, who is 19 and recently stopped working at a burger joint.

Marv found a new job at Freddy & Friends Diner, "A fun place for kids and grown-ups to have endless fun eating pizza, meeting Freddy and his wonderful friends, and more!" annoying, right?

I coded almost everything myself and most models are either made by me or were found free on https://sketchfab.com

I do not own most of the models Including, Proto Freddy, and Proto Bonnie. They were found on Sketchfab, however, are owned by Scott Cawthon.

PLEASE KEEP IN MIND THIS IS A DEMO AND THERE IS MUCH MORE TO COME SOON!!!

Now, time for the important features:

-Voice Detection (You can turn this on or off at any time during the game in the options menu, but it doesn't re-activate it when disabled and re-enabled, You have to turn it on, then beat that level, then it will work.)

-uhh that's sorta it... oh wait

-big dumb ai lol

There are a lot of bugs and this was initially made for FusionZGamer, However, he did not respond to the email I sent to his business email.

Also big thanks to MilitantVJ and his community for the support over the development of Proto & Friends Diner.

Please check him out on Twitch at: https://www.twitch.tv/militantvj.

If you are skipping through, PLEASE READ THIS PART HERE.

There will most likely not be a Proto & Friends Diner 2, or so much of a demo for Proto & Friends Diner 2.

Even then, there might not even be a Proto & Friends Diner Full Release, If this does do good I may have higher intentions to finish the game and polish it up a bunch, alongside possibly create Proto & Friends Diner 2.

Please DO NOT give fusion, his brother Rexter, or MilitantVJ hate, as they are usually extremally busy working on videos, or live streams, and I understand completely.

This demo only has 2 playable areas excluding the main menu, the Parking Lot area, and the loading scenes. I am also including only 5 total characters. using only 3 in the demo. (including the player of course)

Subscribe to Warrior-E_X_E on YouTube here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_cDdcAqU6cwgDH9mXwK3mw

Join the discord here: https://discord.gg/X5rWf2m3zZ (don't worry I'm  not a monster, it never expires.)

Enjoy!!!
